etymology: dual of a primitive noun (but used in a singular sense)
avSummary: water 571, piss 2, waters + 06440 2, watersprings 2, washing 1, watercourse + 04161 1, waterflood 1, watering 1, variant 1
definition:
1) water, waters
    1a) water
    1b) water of the feet, urine
    1c) of danger, violence, transitory things, refreshment (fig.)
